name: CGEventSuppressionState
desc: Specify the event suppression states that can occur after posting an event.

items.name: case eventSuppressionStateSuppressionInterval
items.desc: Specifies that certain local hardware events may be suppressed for a short interval after posting an event.

items.name: case eventSuppressionStateRemoteMouseDrag
items.desc: Specifies that certain local hardware events may be suppressed during a mouse drag operation (mouse movement with the left or only mouse button down).
